content.rendered:
Sponsor packages

Interested in sponsoring FOSS4G-ASIA? Contact us!

Supporter: Minimum contribution USD 1,000

Benefits:

  • Maximum number of Supporters is not restricted
  • Free registration for 1 persons belonging to the sponsor organization.
  • Display of Supporter Logo linked to URL on Conference Website.

Silver Sponsor: Minimum contribution USD 2,000

Benefits:

  • Maximum number of Silver Sponsors is restricted to 5
  • Free registration for 3 persons belonging to the sponsor organization.
  • Display of Sponsor Logo linked to URL on Conference Website.
  • 10% discount for Exhibition booth (See rates below).

Gold Sponsor: Minimum contribution USD 3,000

Benefits:

  • Maximum number of Gold Sponsors is restricted to 3
  • Free registration for 4 persons belonging to sponsor organization.
  • Display of the Sponsor logo linked to URL on the Conference Website and other promotion materials.
  • One page free advertisement (color) in Conference Proceedings.
  • 30% discount for Exhibition booth (See rates below).

Platinum sponsor: Minimum Contribution USD 5,000

Benefits:

  • Maximum number of Platinum Sponsors is restricted to 2
  • Free registration for 5 persons belonging to sponsor organization.
  • Display of the Sponsor logo linked to URL on Conference Website and other promotion materials.
  • One page free advertisement (color) in Conference Proceedings.
  • 50% discount for Exhibition booth (See rates below).

Exhibition Booth Rates

Benefits
(11:00AM of 3th December 2014 till 16:00PM 4th December 2014)

  • 500 USD per square meter
  • Standard Built-up booth size 3x2x2m or 3x3x2m

Advertisement Fee:

Benefits:
Advertisements in the Conference Proceedings. Rates as below;

  • Half Page color USD 300
  • Full Page color USD 500
  • Full inside back cover (color) USD 1000

Sponsorship package can be tailored to meet individual requirements (e.g. substituting exhibition space for additional delegates or some alternative benefit).

Please contact foss4g.asian@gmail.com with any questions.
